info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 3 at 3:01PM CDT until April 27 at 5:48AM CDT by NWS Jackson MS
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas...Mississippi... Louisiana...
Mississippi River Near Arkansas City affecting Desha, Washington, Chicot and Bolivar Counties.
Mississippi River Near Greenville affecting Washington, Chicot, Issaquena and East Carroll Counties.
Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson, Adams and Concordia Counties.
Mississippi River At Vicksburg affecting Claiborne, Jefferson, Tensas, Madison and Warren Counties.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Mississippi River at Natchez.
* WHEN...From Monday, April 14 to Sunday, April 27.
* IMPACTS...At 51.0 feet, Water is covering the roads in old downtown area of Fort Adams.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 34.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday, April 14 and to a crest of 52.0 feet Monday, April 21. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.water.noaa.gov/wfo/jan
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 315 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY, APRIL 14 TO SUNDAY, APRIL 27

area.areaDesc: Concordia, LA; Adams, MS; Wilkinson, MS
